Text:
Thanks for the release.
But I can't help thinking somethings shouldn't be released in HD, porn is one of them. Pornstars rarely have bodies that look good in high definition.
I believe porn should look great in 3D though. LOL.
This movie was not filmed in high def. The bluray contains standard def footage. It looks like the DVD was upscaled to 1080p and packed into a Bluray disc.
